articles.title: Wahgunyah, the country footy team that became famous for losing, records a famous win
articles.description: The country football club that made headlines for its big losses records its first win in more than 1,000 days. It marks a special moment for the community in Wahgunyah amid the club's fight for survival.
articles.content:
Wahgunyah, the country footy team that became famous for losing, has finally won a game.
